fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.timer

Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.timer.Timer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public abstract class Timer
extends Object
implements Runnable
    A timer class which display time according to the delays specified in the TimerConfig using the abstract method sendTimeMessage(String).
